title: SEE THRU BEER FAUCET HANDLE HOLLOW TO FILL WITH INGREDIENTS The"BE ANYTHING" Beer Tap Lever
features: FILL WITH INGREDIENTS MALT HOPS ETC
FILL WITH ANYTHING YOU LIKE - JELLY BEANS EVEN
THREADED 3/8" x 16 FOR STANDARD BEER TAP LEVER
description: Here's a clever new idea in beer tap handles! This is a hollow clear Lexan INGREDIENT HANDLE with a top that unscrews so you can fill it with a sample of the ingredients that are in the beer. Don't limit yourself to just ingredients like Coffee Beans, Malt, Hops, Cinnamon, you can fill these with anything you want, colored tissue strands, colored threads, beads, anything! Think shredded money! Threaded 3/8" x 16 for standard beer tap lever. These are clear hollow lexan plastic tap handles that screw onto any standard beer faucet. The silver top unscrews to reveal a hollow tube inside that you can fill with all manner of small goodies! The handle is 6.5" (60mm) tall, and the flat angled side of the top is 2"x1.5" You can put a sticker here if you want.

title: It's easy to insert your own logo into our changeable taps
Fun Way to Customize Your Tap Handle on Your Kegerator
